|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7240; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 350<!-- 350 / 400 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S25FL032PIF; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3S56D40FTP-G5; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/15/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 20 |upc = 191120100562 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00JZDZOY0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9285; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "11n Access Point-6 (AR) A" and "REV:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The device is using a ''Group-Tek'' Ethernet transformer.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=242&model=TL-WA730RE Product page] (current pictures show the v2 unit) {{â€¢}} [http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-WA730RE&version=V1 Downloads]
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wa730re ''TP-LINK TL-WA730RE v1'' on '''OpenWrt wiki''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} Unlike the [[TP-LINK TL-WA730RE v2]], this device lacks a power button and does have support for ''DD-WRT''. *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=156287 Main thread on the '''DD-WRT Forum'''] *[http://svn.dd-wrt.com/ticket/2587 Ticket #2587 on the ''DD-WRT Trac'' regarding adding support for the device]
I have managed to get OpenWrt working on this, all I needed to do was to flash the [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=24940 firmware for the WA701ND v1 ], as they are are identical hardware wise. This does not include a WebUI, so you have to be connected to the internet in order to get the WebUI. This is completely unofficial! [[User:George109|George109]] ([[User talk:George109|talk]])
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=156287 Forum thread Test build]
Please insert instructions here
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wa730re_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wa730re |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 18.06.9 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
